tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE consent_mechanisms_for_ar_experiences ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    user_id INT NOT NULL, 
    ar_experience_id INT NOT NULL, 
    consent_given BOOLEAN NOT NULL, 
    consent_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    sensitive_information TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE consent_users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  consent_given BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ar_experiences (
  experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experience_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  created_by INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES consent_users(user_id)
)

CREATE TABLE consent_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  experience_id INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  consent_given BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES consent_users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES ar_experiences(experience_id)
)

CREATE TABLE consent_requests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    ar_experience_id UUID,
    consent_given BOOLEAN,
    date_created TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE consent_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    ar_experience_id UUID,
    consent_status BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
AR_User_Information (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, consent_given BOOLEAN NOT NULL)
